Name: On my own: A Hot Isekai Adventure
About the game: During a religious ritual performed only by men, something goes wrong and they ended up disappearing. To bring them back, the witch Hecate starts a powerful ritual but she ends up making a mistake and an unexpected man is summoned. Now, a young and shy boy named Ryo sees himself in a fantastic place surrounded by dangers but also full of beauties, magicians, and thieves. Will he return home or choose to stay in this new world? Classic JRPG; 4 Unique Playable Characters; Party System;
